Operational Notes¶

Busy-State Policy¶

When a pull is in progress, POST /pull-data and POST /update-analysis return 409 with {"busy": true}. The app uses a lock-backed state to ensure only one pull runs at a time.

Idempotency Strategy¶

The applicants table uses a unique constraint on url and inserts use ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING to avoid duplicate rows during repeated pulls.
